messages.subject: Christian comments
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Ren, I use to get really ticked about be lumped in with other Christians . I would say I was a Christ believer when needing to identify myself
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
Ren, I use to get really ticked about be lumped in with
other "Christians".
I would say I was a Christ "believer" when needing to identify myself
religously.
One day I had a guy say..
"Why don't you call yourself a Christian?"
I explained myself somewhat like you, Ren.
And he simply couldn't get over that since defined Christian= to be like
Christ.
I guess it is who you talk to and the labelings of Christian and what it
stands for..
Just like the word unschooler.
To those of you on this list you are open minded and have one view.
But when I talk to a fellow teacher and use that word unschooler, they are
often filled with disdain and unbelief as well as disgust.

Just my thoughts!
Bj


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
